Use a reputed media player that can play H.265 (HEVC : High Efficiency Video Coding) videos has proper ASS subtitle support.
Media Player Classic - Home Cinema and MPC-BE are recommended!.. VLC is Okay, but MPC variants are preferred :)
http://mpc-hc.org
http://mpcbe.sourceforge.net
VLC and players like latest GOM, KMP/PotP with LAV can play HEVC. To display ASS subs properly, KMPlayer/PotPlayer may need to be configured to use external subtitle filters...
Linux, Mac, Chrome : http://libde265.org
In Mobile, Android, Tabs, use a media player like VLC Player, MX Player... that can play H.265 :)
For more info, read the How_to_Play_ file inside the torrent.

H.265 is the Next Generation Codec... Some software media players that are not up-to date may not play HEVC video!
As for now (Dawn of 2015), no hardware decoder, hardware player for h265 (HEVC) yet...
Wait for the future.. :)
HEVC (H.265) Video : http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High_Efficiency_Video_Coding
ASS/SSA Sub Format : http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SubStation_Alpha


Plot Summary
The 2nd season of Jojo's Bizarre Adventure: Stardust Crusaders.
After 30 gruelling days of fighting off wave after wave of assassins sent by the megalomaniacal vampire DIO
(all the while travelling by plane, train, and automobile from Japan, through South-East Asia, and across the Middle East),
Jotaro and his allies have made it at last to Egypt where DIO lies in wait. DIO, striving to end the Joestar line
that has stood in his way for 100 years, sends his final and most fervent team of Stand-user followers, the 9 Egyptian Gods,
to eliminate Jotaro and his allies. Jotaro and his party now have only two weeks to make their way to DIOÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s hideout
in Cairo and eliminate him before JotaroÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s mother succumbs to DIOÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s curse...
